This is the R markdown file for Homework 1, P8105 Data Science, created by Mungyu Kwok on September 16th 2025.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(moderndive)
```

# Problem 1
```{r}
data("early_january_weather")
```

```{r}
names(early_january_weather)   # variable names
nrow(early_january_weather)    # number of rows
ncol(early_january_weather)    # number of columns
mean(early_january_weather$temp, na.rm = TRUE)   # mean temperature
```
The `early_january_weather` dataset contains `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows and 
`r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns.  
Important variables include `origin`, `year`, `month`, `day`, `hour`, `temp`, `dewp`, `humid`, `wind_dir`, `wind_dir`, `wind_speed`, `wind_gust`, `precip`, `pressure`, `visib` and `time_hour`.  
The mean temperature during this period was `r mean(early_january_weather$temp, na.rm = TRUE)` degrees Fahrenheit.
